Class BandPassFilter

extends Filter

    • Method Detail

      • frequencyRange

        public static double[][] frequencyRange(double[][] data,
                        FrequencyRange fr,
                        double fs)
        Filters the signal to only keep the given frequency range
        Parameters:
        data - data to filters, modified by copy (original won't be altered)
        fr - frequency range (in Hz)
        fs - sampling rate
        Returns:
        a filtered data

      • lowAmplitude

        public static double[][] lowAmplitude(double[][] data,
                      double threshold)
        Apply a Low cut-off filter to the data
        Parameters:
        data -
        threshold - above which data will be erased
        Returns:
        the filtered data, which usually contains less samples, since some have been erased
        See Also:
        #highAmplitude(double[][], double)}

      • highAmplitude

        public static double[][] highAmplitude(double[][] data,
                       double threshold)
        Apply a High cut-off filter to the data
        Parameters:
        data -
        threshold - bellow which data will be erased
        Returns:
        the filtered data, which usually contains less samples, since some have been erased
        See Also:
        #lowAmplitude(double[][], double)}

                   BandPassFilter.AMPLITUDE ampl)
        Parameters:

        threshold -
        ampl -
        Returns:
